ygData.subject: Re: Side effect/Symptom of twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: I usually respond to newbie begging by telling them that I ll give them lots of help, as long as they aren t asking for money or equipment.  If they respond
ygData.messageBody:
I usually respond to newbie begging by telling them that I'll give them lots
of help, as long as they aren't asking for money or equipment. If they
respond that I'm being a smartass, I tell them that although I really
dislike beggars, I'm very free with any information they might need. They
USUALLY end up thanking me.

> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> YES!, It is very annoying. I like to help out people within the
> confines of the game (locate body ect.) but Begging for money is a
> different case altogether. I always ignore begging but it makes me
> feel guilty anyway.
